meta.job_title: Customer Service and Sales Operations Manager

duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage customer service and sales operations in retail settings.
Supervise and coordinate the activities of retail staff to ensure efficient store operations.
Provide customer service and support to enhance the shopping experience.
Develop sales strategies and motivate staff to achieve sales targets.
Communicate effectively with customers and manage their feedback and requests.
Organize and oversee daily store operations to maintain a positive shopping environment.
